packagegui.title: Services: Zabbix-2 Proxy

field.description: List of comma delimited IP addresses (or hostnames) of ZABBIX servers
Port of Zabbix trapper on Zabbix server. default value 10051
Unique, case-sensitive proxy name. Make sure the proxy name is known to the server
Select Zabbix proxy mode (Active is default)
How often the proxy retrieves configuration data from the Zabbix server in seconds. Ignored if the proxy runs in passive mode.
Advanced parameters. There are some rarely used parameters that sometimes need to be defined. Value has form, example: StartDiscoverers=10
